sub_form_definition.css_definition: @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Josefin Sans');.form {background: linear-gradient(45deg, rgba(0,0,0,0), rgba(0,0,0,0));align-items: center;margin-left: 15%;width: 70%; font-family: Josefin Sans;color: black;font-weight: 600;} h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, a, textarea, input[type=text], .select2-container input[type=text], .select2-choices, .select2-choices input .select2-input, .form-control, .footer {font-family: Josefin Sans;color: black;font-weight: 600;} p, .btn {font-family: Josefin Sans;font-weight: 600;}.form textarea {height: 120px !important;border: 1px solid black;}.btn {background: linear-gradient(45deg, black, black);color: white;border-radius: 30px;border: 1px solid black;height: 50px;width: 500px;display: block;margin: auto;}.btn:hover {background: grey;color: white;border: 2px solid grey;border-radius: 30px;}input[type=text] {box-sizing: border-box;height: 50px !important;width: 100%;border: 1px solid black;}.select2-container input[type=text] {box-sizing: border-box;height: 50px !important;width: 100%;border: 1px solid white;}.form-control {height: 50px;margin-bottom: 0px;height: 100%;padding-top: 10px;margin-bottom: 0px;border: 1px solid black;}.select2-choices {border: 1px solid black;border-radius: 5px !important;box-shadow: 5px 10px inset white !important;}select.form-control {height: 50px;}a {margin-bottom: 10px;padding: 10px;padding-top: 13px;padding-left: 20px;padding-right: 20px;border-radius: 5px;text-align: center; border: 1px solid black;}.select2-search-choice {margin-bottom: 10px;padding: 10px;padding-top: 13px;padding-left: 20px;padding-right: 20px;border-radius: 5px;text-align: center;}.centered {position: absolute;top: 50%;left: 50%;transform: translate(-50%, -50%);}.header h1 {font-family: Josefin Sans;font-weight: 600;font-size: 6.5vw;text-align: left;color: black;padding-top: 5px;margin-left: 16%;}.pre_html h1 {font-family: Josefin Sans;font-weight: 600;font-size: 40px;text-align: left;color: black;margin-left: 16%;padding-bottom: 10px;}hr {border: 1px solid black;width: 68%;margin-left: 16%;}h5 {text-align: left;color: black;font-weight: 700;font-family: Josefin Sans;padding-left: 2%;}.footer {text-align: center;color: white;padding-bottom: 20px;margin-bottom: -20px;margin-top: 0px;font-size: 14px;background-color: black;padding-top: 20px;}.header {display: fixed;}.pre_html {display: none;}@media only screen and (max-width:1100px) {.form {width: 100% !important;margin-left: 0% !important;}hr {width: 100% !important;margin-left: 0vw !important;}h1 {font-size: 40px !important;margin-left: auto !important;text-shadow: 0px 0px black;}.header {padding: 20px;padding-bottom: 0px;}}@media only screen and (max-width:600px) {.pre_html {display: fixed;}.btn {width:290px !important;}}.social_links {text-align: center;display: flex;justify-content: center;align-items: center;margin-top: 10px;}.social_links a {text-align: center;text-decoration: underline;font-family: Josefin Sans;font-size: 16px;border: 0px solid white;color: blue;}.select2-search-choice-close {border: 0px solid white !important;padding: 0px !important;}

inputs.input_label: Enter a unique skill name needed to create apps in Cliosight

sub_form_definition.label: Skills
